0.text: Innate: Fiora identifies the Vitals of nearby  visible enemy champions, marked as an arc around them in North-, East-, South- or Westward direction. Vitals take 1.75 seconds to become targetable and linger for 13.25 seconds afterwards while Fiora remains near the target, otherwise the Vital will disappear. After a Vital ends, Fiora identifies a new one on her target.
0.html: Innate: Fiora identifies the Vitals of nearby visible enemy champions, marked as an arc around them in North-, East-, South- or Westward direction. Vitals take 1.75 seconds to become targetable and linger for 13.25 seconds afterwards while Fiora remains near the target, otherwise the Vital will disappear. After a Vital ends, Fiora identifies a new one on her target.
markedPassages: visible

1.text: Dealing damage in the direction of a Vital will trigger it to deal  bonus true damage equal to 3% (+ 4% per 100 bonus AD) of target's maximum health,  heal Fiora for 35 − 100 (based on level), and grant her 20 / 30 / 40 / 50% (based on  Grand Challenge's Rank)  bonus movement speed that decays over 1.85 seconds.
1.html: Dealing damage in the direction of a Vital will trigger it to deal  bonus true damage equal to 3% (+ 4% per 100 bonus AD) of target's maximum health, heal Fiora for 35 − 100 (based on level), and grant her 20 / 30 / 40 / 50% (based on Grand Challenge's Rank)  bonus movement speed that decays over 1.85 seconds.
markedPassages: bonus true damage
3% (+ 4% per 100 bonus AD) of target's maximum health
3% (+ 4% per 100 bonus AD) of target's maximum health
heal
20 / 30 / 40 / 50% (based on Grand Challenge's Rank)
bonus movement speed

0.text: Active: Fiora  dashes in the target direction, then stabs a nearby enemy. Lunge can hit structures and  wards. Stabbing a target reduces Lunge's  cooldown by 50%.
0.html: Active: Fiora dashes in the target direction, then stabs a nearby enemy. Lunge can hit structures and wards. Stabbing a target reduces Lunge's  cooldown by 50%.
markedPassages: dashes
wards
cooldown

1.text: The stab deals physical damage and applies  on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness.
1.html: The stab deals physical damage and applies on-hit effects at 100% effectiveness.
markedPassages: on-hit

2.text: Fiora can cast any of her abilities during the dash. The target does not have to be  visible to be hit by this ability.
2.html: Fiora can cast any of her abilities during the dash. The target does not have to be visible to be hit by this ability.
markedPassages: visible
possibleConcerningAbilities: Fiora can cast any of her abilities during the dash. The target does not have to be  visible to be hit by this ability.

0.text: Active: Fiora enters a defensive stance for 0.75 seconds, becoming  unable to act, preventing all incoming non- turret damage, and gaining debuff immunity and  crowd control immunity.
0.html: Active: Fiora enters a defensive stance for 0.75 seconds, becoming unable to act, preventing all incoming non- turret damage, and gaining debuff immunity and crowd control immunity.
markedPassages: unable to act
turret
crowd control immunity

1.text: Additionally, over the first 0.6 seconds of the duration, Fiora poises to strike, after which she sends a shock with her sword in a line in the target direction, dealing magic damage to all enemies hit until colliding with an enemy champion.
1.html: Additionally, over the first 0.6 seconds of the duration, Fiora poises to strike, after which she sends a shock with her sword in a line in the target direction, dealing magic damage to all enemies hit until colliding with an enemy champion.

2.text: The enemy champion struck is also  slowed and  crippled by 50% for 2 seconds. If Riposte negates at least one hostile  immobilizing effect, Fiora  stuns the target for the same duration instead.
2.html: The enemy champion struck is also slowed and crippled by 50% for 2 seconds. If Riposte negates at least one hostile immobilizing effect, Fiora stuns the target for the same duration instead.
markedPassages: slowed
crippled
immobilizing
stuns

0.text: Active: Fiora empowers her next two basic attacks on-attack within 4 seconds to gain  25 bonus range and  bonus attack speed.
0.html: Active: Fiora empowers her next two basic attacks on-attack within 4 seconds to gain  25 bonus range and  bonus attack speed.
markedPassages: 25 bonus range
bonus attack speed

1.text: The first attack  slows the target by 30% for 1 second but cannot  critically strike. The second attack will  critically strike for  modified critical damage, including to  structures.
1.html: The first attack slows the target by 30% for 1 second but cannot critically strike. The second attack will critically strike for  modified critical damage, including to structures.
markedPassages: slows
critically strike
critically strike
modified critical damage
structures

2.text: Bladework  resets Fiora's basic attack timer.
2.html: Bladework resets Fiora's basic attack timer.
markedPassages: resets
possibleConcerningAbilities: Bladework  resets Fiora's basic attack timer.

0.text: Passive:  Duelist's Dance's  bonus movement speed is increased.
0.html: Passive: Duelist's Dance's  bonus movement speed is increased.
markedPassages: Duelist's Dance's
bonus movement speed

1.text: Active: Fiora challenges the target enemy champion for 8 seconds, highlighting all four of their Vitals after a 0.5-second delay. While in effect,  Duelist's Dance does not identify new Vitals on Fiora's target.
1.html: Active: Fiora challenges the target enemy champion for 8 seconds, highlighting all four of their Vitals after a 0.5-second delay. While in effect, Duelist's Dance does not identify new Vitals on Fiora's target.
markedPassages: Duelist's Dance

2.text: While near the target, Fiora gains  Duelist's Dance's  bonus movement speed.
2.html: While near the target, Fiora gains Duelist's Dance's  bonus movement speed.
markedPassages: Duelist's Dance's
bonus movement speed

3.text: If Fiora triggers at least one Vital before the target  dies, or triggers all four, she creates a  Victory Zone at their location for 2 − 5 (based on Vitals hit) seconds, which  heals Fiora and all allies within the area every second.
3.html: If Fiora triggers at least one Vital before the target dies, or triggers all four, she creates a Victory Zone at their location for 2 − 5 (based on Vitals hit) seconds, which heals Fiora and all allies within the area every second.
markedPassages: dies
Victory Zone
heals

4.text: Unlike  Duelist's Dance, the Vitals will continue to linger even if Fiora is not nearby.
4.html: Unlike Duelist's Dance, the Vitals will continue to linger even if Fiora is not nearby.
markedPassages: Duelist's Dance
possibleConcerningAbilities: Unlike  Duelist's Dance, the Vitals will continue to linger even if Fiora is not nearby.
